column1: #   YQFID
#   Title abbreviations
#   佚   : Okai Shingo 岡井慎吾. Gyokuhen itsubun 玉篇佚文 [A list of Yupian quoted fragments in other books] . Gyokuhen no kenkyu 玉篇の研究 [A study of yupian]. Toyo Bunko (The Oriental Library) 東洋文庫. 1933.

#   補   : Mabuchi Kazuo 馬渕和夫. Gyokuhen itsubun hosei 玉篇佚文補正 [A revised list of Yupian quoted fragments in other books]. Tokyo Bunrika Daigaku Kokugo Kokubun Gakkai Kiyo (Bulletin of the Association for the Study of Japanese Language and Literature, Tokyo University of Arts and Sciences) 東京文理科大学国語国文学会紀要 3: 1-153. 1952.
#   新   : The original Yupian quoted fragments in Shinsen jikyo 新撰字鏡所引玉篇. Sadakari Itoku 貞苅伊徳. Sinsen jikyo no kaibō 新撰字鏡の解剖. Sinsen jikyo no kenkyū 新撰字鏡の研究. Tokyo: Kyūko Shoin 東京: 汲古書院. 1998

#   理   : The original Yupian quoted fragments in Daijō rishu rokuharamitsukyō shakumon 大乘理趣六波羅蜜經釋文所引玉篇. Daijō rishu rokuharamitsukyō shakumon 大乘理趣六波羅蜜經釋文 (Uhaturashitsu sōsho 優鉢羅室叢書).Kyoto: Kanda Kiichirō 神田喜一郎. 1972.

#   令   : The original Yupian quoted fragments in Ryō-no-Shūge 令集解所引玉篇. Inoue Masamichi 井上順理. Ryō-no-Shūge in Gyokuhen itsubun kō 令集解引玉篇佚文考 [A study of fragments from Yupian gleaned from Ryō-no-Shūge]. Reports of the Faculty of Education: Humanities and Social Sciences 鳥取大学教育学部研究報告.人文社会科学 17: 77-124. 1966.
#   類   : The original Yupian quoted fragments in Zushoryō manuscript Ruiju myōgishō 図書寮本類聚名義抄所引玉篇.
#   弘   : The Tenrei banshō meigi quoted fragments in Zushoryō manuscript Ruiju myōgishō 図書寮本類聚名義抄所引篆隷万象名義.
